questions.title: 你的电脑桌上有什么？
questions.answer: What is there on your computer desk?

questions.title: 你精致的小盒子里有什么？
questions.answer: What is there in your exquisite little box?

questions.title: 在我们面前有什么好吹捧她儿子的？
questions.answer: What is there to lavish praise on her son to us?

questions.title: 你的新冰箱里有什么东西？
questions.answer: What are there in your new fridge?

questions.title: 最近的医院在哪儿？
questions.answer: Where is there the nearest hospital?

questions.title: 附近哪里有公共汽车站？
questions.answer: Where is there a bus stop nearby?

questions.title: 哪儿有房子出租？
questions.answer: Where is there an apartment for rent?

title: ——你的行李箱里有哪些东西啊？
——我的箱子里有一双运动鞋、三件衣服和一条裤子。

answer.en: What are there in your luggage?
There is a pair of sports shoes, three pieces of coats and a pair of trousers.
How many men are there in your party?
None, all of them are women.
How much water is there in your bottle?
